page.title: 10Vandalism and Graffiti
page.content: There is a lot of vandalism and graffiti in Stevenage. These are not the same. Graffiti is basically spray-can painting, or you can use pens or paint. Vandalism is stupid and ignorant. There are a lot of smashed windows and broken walls, smashed-up buses, shelters and cars. Graffiti can be very messy but it can be neat and good to look at. Some of my friends say to me "why don't the council make special places for graffiti?" I like graffiti quite a lot. It is good fun. I do it on cardboard or large pieces of board.
